com.kme.kaltura.kmesdk.content.whiteboard

Interface IKmeWhiteboardListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKmeSlidesListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KmeSlidesView, KmeWhiteboardView

    public IKmeWhiteboardListener

    An interface for whiteboard in the room

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds the drawing.
      void hideLaser()
      Hide the laser pointer.

      Initialize function. Setting config.

      Removes the existing drawing from the whiteboard view.

      Sets the list of drawings.

      Updates the whiteboard background.

      Updates the current position of the laser pointer. Show pointer if not already created.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(@Nullable
          KmeWhiteboardView.Config whiteboardConfig)

        Initialize function. Setting config.

        Parameters:
        whiteboardConfig - The metadata for whiteboard.

      • setDrawings

        void setDrawings(@NotNull
                 java.util.List<com.kme.kaltura.kmesdk.ws.message.module.KmeWhiteboardModuleMessage.WhiteboardPayload.Drawing> drawings)

        Sets the list of drawings.

        Parameters:
        drawings - The list of drawings.

      • addDrawing

        void addDrawing(@NotNull
                WhiteboardPayload.Drawing drawing)

        Adds the drawing.

        Parameters:
        drawing - The drawing containing a path object with all the data needed for drawing.

      • updateBackground

        void updateBackground(@Nullable
                      KmeWhiteboardBackgroundType backgroundType)

        Updates the whiteboard background.

        Parameters:
        backgroundType - The type of whiteboard background that needs to draw.

      • updateLaserPosition

        void updateLaserPosition(@NotNull
                         android.graphics.PointF point)

        Updates the current position of the laser pointer. Show pointer if not already created.

        Parameters:
        point - The point that contains coordinates for the laser pointer.

      • hideLaser

        void hideLaser()

        Hide the laser pointer.

      • removeDrawing

        void removeDrawing(@NotNull
                   java.lang.String layer)

        Removes the existing drawing from the whiteboard view.

        Parameters:
        layer - The id of the drawing to be removed.

      • removeDrawings

        void removeDrawings()

        Removes all drawings from the whiteboard view.
